prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a sturdy build and a rocky exterior.
Design a powerful ground-type Pokemon that can maneuver through rough terrains.
Imagine a Pokemon that is both fierce and resilient, showcasing its brawn.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that has a strong affinity for mountain habitats.
Generate a Pokemon that combines earth and rock elements with a unique stance.
Make a Pokemon that looks intimidating yet friendly, perfect for long journeys.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies strength and determination, ideal for battles.
